# .github/workflows/update-dashboard.yml
name: Update Publications Dashboard

on:
  schedule:
    # æ¯æ—¥ãƒ‘ãƒªæ™‚é–“7æ™‚ï¼ˆUTC 6æ™‚ã€å¤æ™‚é–“è€ƒæ…®ã§UTC 5æ™‚ï¼‰ã«å®Ÿè¡Œ
    - cron: '0 5 * * *'
  workflow_dispatch: # æ‰‹å‹•å®Ÿè¡Œã‚‚å¯èƒ½

jobs:
  update-dashboard:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout repository
      uses: actions/checkout@v3
      
    - name: Setup Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v4
      with:
        python-version: '3.9'
        
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: |
        pip install requests beautifulsoup4 pytz
        
    - name: Run crawler and update HTML
      run: |
        python crawler.py
        
    - name: Commit and push changes
      run: |
        git config --local user.email "action@github.com"
        git config --local user.name "GitHub Action"
        git add index.html publications_data.json
        git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -m "ğŸ¤– Auto-update dashboard $(date)"
        git push
        
    - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
      uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3
      with:
        github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
        publish_dir: .
        publish_branch: gh-pages
